subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson overpowered the field in the Pepsi 500 at Auto Club Speedway, leading 227 of 250 laps on the two-mile oval and grabbing his third victory of the season.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson overpowered the field in the Pepsi 500 at Auto Club Speedway, leading 227 of 250 laps on the two-mile oval and grabbing his third victory of the season.
